CreateCustomDomain.document: 创建一个自定义域名，关闭了waf防护，路由配置开启重写策略，该策略是通配符匹配替换。
CreateCustomDomain.title: 示例1

CreateCustomDomain.document: 创建一个自定义域名，开启了waf 防护，路由配置开启重写策略，该策略是精确路径匹配替换。
CreateCustomDomain.title: 示例2

CreateFunction.title: 创建函数

CreateNamespace.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: scf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateNamespace
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Namespace": "test"
}
CreateNamespace.title: 创建命名空间。

CreateTrigger.title: 创建新的触发器

DeleteCustomDomain.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1

DeleteFunction.document: 用户删除函数时需要使用，可指定版本与命名空间。
DeleteFunction.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: scf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeleteFunction
<公共请求参数>

{
    "FunctionName": "<FunctionName>"
}
DeleteFunction.title: 删除函数

DeleteLayerVersion.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: scf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeleteLayerVersion
<公共请求参数>

{
    "LayerName": "abc",
    "LayerVersion": 0
}
DeleteLayerVersion.title: 删除层版本

DeleteReservedConcurrencyConfig.title: 删除函数最大独占配额

DeleteTrigger.document: 用户使用该函数删除触发器。
DeleteTrigger.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: scf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeleteTrigger
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Type": "timer",
    "FunctionName": "ledDummyAPITest",
    "TriggerName": "test3"
}
DeleteTrigger.title: 删除触发器

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: scf.tencentcloudapi.com

        "abc"
    ]
}

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: scf.tencentcloudapi.com

PublishLayerVersion.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: scf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: PublishLayerVersion
<公共请求参数>

{
    "LayerName": "abc",
    "CompatibleRuntimes": [
        "abc"
    ],
    "Content": {
        "CosBucketName": "abc",
        "CosObjectName": "abc",
        "ZipFile": "abc",
        "CosBucketRegion": "abc",
        "DemoId": "abc",
        "TempCosObjectName": "abc",
        "GitUrl": "abc",
        "GitUserName": "abc",
        "GitPassword": "abc",
        "GitPasswordSecret": "abc",
        "GitBranch": "abc",
        "GitDirectory": "abc",
        "GitCommitId": "abc",
        "GitUserNameSecret": "abc",
        "ImageConfig": {
            "RegistryId": "abc",
            "ImageType": "abc",
            "ImageUri": "abc",
            "EntryPoint": "abc",
            "Command": "abc",
            "Args": "abc",
            "ContainerImageAccelerate": true
        }
    },
    "Description": "abc",
    "LicenseInfo": "abc"
}
PublishLayerVersion.title: 发布层版本

UpdateFunctionCode.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: scf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateFunctionCode
<公共请求参数>

{
    "CosObjectName": "<CosObjectName>",
    "Handler": "index.main",
    "CosBucketName": "<CosBucketName>",
    "FunctionName": "test"
}
UpdateFunctionCode.title: 更新函数代码

UpdateFunctionConfiguration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: scf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateFunctionConfiguration
<公共请求参数>

{
    "FunctionName": "<FunctionName>",
    "Description": "<Description>"
}
UpdateFunctionConfiguration.title: 更新函数配置

UpdateFunctionEventInvokeConfig.title: 异步重试配置请求示例

UpdateTrigger.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: scf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateTrigger
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Enable": "CLOSE",
    "FunctionName": "helloworld-xxxxxxxx",
    "TriggerName": "\t\nSCF-timer-xxxxxxxx",
    "Type": "timer",
    "Qualifier": "$DEFAULT",
    "Namespace": "default",
    "TriggerDesc": "0 0 0 */2 * * *",
    "Description": "测试",
    "CustomArgument": "中文测试"
}
UpdateTrigger.title: 接口调用示例

UpdateTriggerStatus.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: scf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateTriggerStatus
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Enable": "CLOSE",
    "Type": "timer",
    "FunctionName": "<FunctionName>",
    "TriggerName": "<TriggerName>"
}
UpdateTriggerStatus.title: 修改触发器状态
